agal.name: AtmosphereShader
agal.vertexShader: // vc0-3 = world * view * projection matrix // va0.xyz = vertex position // va1.xy = texture coordinates m44 op, va0, vc0 //mov v0, va1 //mov vt0, va1 mov v0, va0
agal.fragmentShader: // fc0.xyz = atmosphere color // fc1.xyz = (0.8, 12, 2.0) // fc2.xyz = (0.0, 0.0, 1.0) // v0.xyz = vertex normal mul ft0, v0, fc1.z dp3 ft0, ft0, fc2 sub ft0, fc1.x, ft0 pow ft0, ft0, fc1.y mul oc, fc0.xyzw, ft0
